messages.title: A STRONG LOCAL VOICE IN A NEW GOVERNMENT
messages.content: Steve Brine will serve Winchester & Chandler's Ford as a hard-working dedicated local MP. For more than three years as the Conservative candidate he has shown a strong record of action, standing up for local people and the services we all rely on.

messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR STEVE BRINE.
messages.content: 1. A local family man committed to the area. 2. NHS - OUR LOCAL A&E AND EXCELLENT SCHOOLS - a national priority. 3. Standing up for local people in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve Brine is committed to the local NHS. He wants to secure funding for critical services and gain real control of our A&E, Royal Hants & General Hospital to improve local capacity.
Steve supports a low carbon economy and the Conservative's 'Green Deal' which will help people get grants to make their homes more energy efficient, reduce bills and create jobs.
Steve proposes to increase the state pension, plans to get a fair deal for Equitable Life policyholders and keep the Winter Fuel Allowance & free TV licenses for over 75s.

He fights inappropriate over-development which ruins our local landscape and will support laws damaging housing targets, to help establish affordable homes for local people that are properly planned and wanted by existing communities.

issues.environment: Supports a low carbon economy and the 'Green Deal' for home energy efficiency.
issues.health: Committed to securing funding for local critical NHS services and gaining control of local A&E.

housing.content: Fights inappropriate over-development and supports laws damaging housing targets to help establish affordable homes that are properly planned and wanted by existing communities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Shown a strong record of action, standing up for local people and services.

contactInformation.address: St. Clements House, 27-28 Clements Lane, Winchester, SO23 9TA

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Steve Brine: A POSITIVE VOTE FOR CHANGE
